system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Crystal.

Effect: Upon resolving this attack, the user freely uses Fling on the target, ignoring Range restrictions and penalties, with a +100 to their Lift.

Requirement: [Bug] Z-Crystal as an Accessory Item and a Bug-Type attack on the user's Active List.
